org.shared.cli

Class Cli

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.shared.cli.Cli

  • public class Cli
extends Object
    An interpreter for CliOptions annotations, from which Apache Commons CLI Options objects are derived.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine createCommandLine(Class<?> clazz, String[] args)

      Creates a help string.
